title: Muqam express sorrow over demise of Journalist Asghar Khan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 23 (APP):Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs and Gilgit-Baltistan Engineer Amir Muqam Tuesday expressed grief and sorrow over the death of senior journalist Asghar Khan Askari from Lower Dir in a road accident.
The federal minister offered his condolences with the bereaved family and prayed for grant of the Mercy of Allah Almighty for the deceased.
Asghar Khan Askari was a senior journalist from Islamabad and belonged to Lower Dir, said a press release.
